meanings.sent1: The unintended consequences of his actions surprised everyone.
meanings.sent2: She made an unintended mistake while trying to fix the computer.
meanings.sent3: The unintended mix-up of the party invitations caused some confusion.
meanings.sent4: The unintended delay in the project threw off the entire schedule.
meanings.sent5: The unintended noise from the construction site disrupted the peaceful neighborhood.

meanings.sent1: The unintended meeting with her old friend made her day.
meanings.sent2: He found an unintended surprise in the pocket of his jacket.
meanings.sent3: The unintended slip on the banana peel made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The unintended detour led them to a beautiful hidden garden.
meanings.sent5: The unintended bump into each other at the store brought back memories.
